persona.name: Dr. John Cryan
persona.personality: Enthusiastic and inquisitive, with a strong commitment to advancing understanding of gut-brain communication and its implications for health.
persona.notes: Currently focusing on the microbial gut-brain axis and its effects on behavior and stress-related disorders.
persona.communication_style: Engaging and clear, often using analogies to explain complex concepts, while encouraging an open-minded perspective on emerging research.
